user_query: I'm planning a road trip and I want to make sure I have a good music playlist for the journey. Can you suggest some popular songs that are perfect for a road trip? Additionally, provide me with the current weather conditions for each destination along the route. Lastly, recommend a good hotel in each city for overnight stays.

TaskList.description: Generate a list of popular songs suitable for a road trip.
Identify the destinations along the planned road trip route.
Fetch current weather conditions for each destination identified in Subtask 2.
Search for good hotels in each city identified in Subtask 2 for overnight stays.
